title: No search engines available and can't add ones even on sites with OpenSearch
content:
My dad did somethink with Avast antivirus(at least he said so) and after that we have no search engine available. If you try to type something in a serch bar you can only open direct links. Default search engine button in the settings does not respond and even following instructions on the site I can't add new search engines. Tried Google, YouTube and DuckDuckGo but to no avail. There is just no option to add new search engine. 

P.S. Don't know how to reach russian-speaking support, so screenshots are in russian with some explanations on top.
creator: karassukira

title: no audio on youtube
content: after one second of videoplay the audio is gone. Its ony an issue wirh firefox, NOT edge or opera, iron etc!
creator: mivesrozner-firefox

title: Drag files (pdfs mainly) INTO firefox.
content: Hi guys, I am trying to drag and drop files (mainly PDFs) into Firefox, on websites like simPRO and Xero. However they do not work. It works on Chrome Safari Opera. Do i have a setting turned off by default that I can find or is this something that Firefox does not support??
creator: wpfurness

title: How do I sync my desktop bookmark setup to my laptop?
content:
Hi

I have a business and I have a somewhat complex bookmark folder setup on me desktop. This incorporates folders for government (HMRC and Companies House), Clients, Software and personal. I would like to replicate this structure on my laptop. I believe this should be achievable via sync, such that any changes to one is replicated in the other. How do I do this ? Both devices are windows 10.
creator: accounts88

title: Why there is no topics in french ?...
content: bold text Firefox dit qu'il n'y a pas de réponses en français. Déjà, c'est insultant pour les centaines de millions de francophones. Ensuite, avec l'aide (petite) en français du navigateur, je n'arrive pas à résoudre le problème que j'ai : Firefox est lent, très lent à démarrer.

title: Firefox uses Noto Serif CJK SC to replace PingFang SC
content:
This image describes the same website displayed by Firefox and Chrome.

Firefox(left) uses Noto Serif CJK SC to replace PingFang SC but not all replaced.

Chrome(right) is normal(does not replace).

title: error tarjeta DNIe "No es posible añadir el módulo"
content: En W10 (x64), con Firefox x64 v.85.0.1, y DNIe_v14_1_0(64bits) a la hora de cargar el controlador desde la carpeta system32 sale que "no es posible añadir el módulo". Lo he intentado con la version de 32 de Firefox y tampoco me deja. Sigue saliendo el mismo error. Me tiene de cabeza este fallo al no poder utilizar el certificado del DNIe. Alguna solución???. gracias.

title: Firefox hangs when starting alternate profile on Mac
content:
I am on Mac OS 11.1 with Firefox 85.0.1 have an alternate profile called "no-adblock", when I start it from about:profile it opens the window but it hangs indefinitely with a beach ball.

I have started it with this command: /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox --foreground --P no-adblock

But it hangs just the same. No log output. How can I debug this? Is there a way to get the debug output?
creator: grant.west

title: New Tabs page is Reset - all saved tabs are GONE !????
content: Magically? As in Evil, Stupid Magic. Turn off computer. Turn back on 2 hours later: New Tabs page has Completely Reset. All Saved Tabs are gone? Really. Who thought this was a good idea? Let's fuck with the users and screw their saved bookmarks. Nice. Twice, over the past 2 months. And, my other extensions should In No Fucking Way be the Issue. C'mon developers, quit trying to make Firefox 'prettier'..! Just make it work consistently.
creator: barguybrady

title: Tabs Recovery
content: Hi, this isn't quite a tab recovery as the session hasn't ended, it just won't display the window. But it's in private browsing so I don't want to close the window since I understand that nothing will be saved from that session. But is there somewhere I can access a list of tabs while the session still exists? I'd hate to lose them all.

title: Google hyperlinks in News open an interim page
content: Lately I've noticed several Google News hyperlinks, instead of opening the page, instead open a static page with the hyperlink typed out, for example: "Opening https://www.popularmechanics.com/science/a35423435/scientists-testing-quantum-time-theory-inside-nuclear-reactor/", and under it "Close" Nothing happens. I have to click the link. Why is this happening? PC i7 1660 super 32GB RAM browser up to date.
creator: promytius
